QuestData.Title: A Message From Our Enemies
QuestData.Description: $n! The messages from Ly'leth we traced throughout the Terrace - we could not have known at the time, but somebody was watching.$B$BThis crystal was delivered by a courier early this morning. <Pointing to the crystal by her side.>$B$BI am afraid the message contained within is not for the faint of heart. It has not been shown to anyone else, but you deserve to see it for all you have done for us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to Andaris's Message in Shal'Aran.
QuestData.RewardText: I do not know what lies in store for us, but we cannot sit idly while Ly'leth is missing.$B$BWe must act now!
